See also: eintritt

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From eintreten.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈaɪ̯ntrɪt/, [ˈʔäɪ̯ntʁɪt]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Eintritt m (genitive Eintritts or Eintrittes, plural Eintritte)

  1. (chiefly uncountable) occurring; occurrence (the fact that something happens)
  2. (chiefly uncountable) joining; enlistment (becoming a member, e.g. of a club)
  3. (chiefly uncountable) entrance, access (right to go in, also the fee thereof)
  4. (countable, rather rare) entry, entrance (door or area where one enters)

1Now uncommon, see notes

Synonyms[edit]

  • (occurrence): Eintreten
  • (joining): Beitritt; Eintreten
  • (right to go in): Einlass; Zugang; Zutritt
  • (entry): Eingang; Einlass; Zugang
